name: libraryproject_tarpe21
description: Clone the repository into your local directory. Inside the project's root directory, open up a terminal and enter `npm start` to start up the project ### Step 2 In order to run the program, you need to install necessary dependencies. Run `npm install` command. You might have to wait around 10 seconds to 3 minutes depending on your system ### Step 3 Once the necessary dependencies have been successfully installed, you can run the project with "npm start" command ### Result Done. You should see your default browser start up on http://localhost:5000. In case it does not, enter it manually into browser's address bar
